name: King K Roller 2
description:
To a lot of people, King K Rool is nothing but a "meme character". Next to all the A-listers in Smash, he's an absolute nobody! This is true until he discovers a time travel weapon which allow him to conquer the gaming world one console generation at a time.

Find yourself rolling in nine different levels where you go head to head with some of gaming's largest icons, attempting to tarnish their likeness.

King K Roller 2 is primarily a 3D platformer, sprinkled with several aspects from the collect-a-thon and puzzle genres too.

The game offers over 20 hours of content for new players, as it is extremely hard, but ultimately very satisfying to complete. Good luck!
